_templates.javolution.lang

Class Enum

  • java.lang.Object
    • _templates.javolution.lang.Enum
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable

    public abstract class Enum
extends java.lang.Object
implements Comparable, Serializable

    This class is equivalent to java.lang.Enum and is moved (refactored) to the java.lang system package for applications targetting the J2SE 5.0+ run-time.

    This is a clean-room implementation of the Enum base class.

    Version:
    2.0, November 26, 2004
    Author:
    Jean-Marie Dautelle

      • compareTo

        public final int compareTo(java.lang.Object that)
        Compares the position of two enum from the same enumeration.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface Comparable
        Parameters:
        that - the enum to be compared with.
        Returns:
        a negative value, zero, or a positive value as this enum is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified enum.
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassCastException - if both enum do not belong to the same enumeration.

        public static Enum valueOf(java.lang.Class enumType,
                           java.lang.String name)
        Returns the enum from the specified enum's class with the specified name.
        Parameters:

        name - the name of the enum to return.
        Returns:
        the corresponding enum.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the enum does not exist.
